data.title: Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ
data.meta_description: ausgamer529's Review of Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ.  Read GameSpot player reviews and contribute your own!
data.text:
Gamespot should really re-look this games rating

User Rating: 7.5 | Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ DS

Little Red Riding Hood zombie BBQ ....

This game was a definite gamble since i don't trust many cheap games to be good, but after playing this little 5$ gem for my ds im going to change my price theory

what can i say this game has many aspects that i like and don't like that blend for a simple yet challenging experience.

some things i liked were

* it feels like shooter games i grew up playing at chuck E cheese in my early years of gaming with its reloading system

* Little Red is um ... very well designed with her physical features

*The control scheme that allows and handed player to play realy made it a good game because now i dont have to worry about my freinds struggling to figure out how to play a game that only works right or left handed

now its on to the negative things

* no checkpoints: this kinda ticked me off because i dont mind replaying a level because its fun but it get annoying when the level im playing is a bit long

Quite a literal approach to the words "Zombie BBQ"
